raw.text: I am a wicked good researcher. Trust me, I am the coolest that you will ever meet. I’ll do cool science with you, and when we’re done I’m pretty sure you’ll say “Wow! That was super fun science and I can’t wait to do another project with Laura V Ferguson!”. Oogly boogly.

body.text: I am a wicked good researcher. Trust me, I am the coolest that you will ever meet. I’ll do cool science with you, and when we’re done I’m pretty sure you’ll say “Wow! That was super fun science and I can’t wait to do another project with Laura V Ferguson!”. Oogly boogly.
